project.name: |-- 008-numbers-and-dates
project.description:
Keywords: + parse numbers + NumberFormat + Calendar + DateFormat + SimpleDateFormat
This project includes very simple examples involving the Numbers and Dates
NumberFormatTest: Demonstrates how to convert a string taken from the user into a double and then format the number according to the default locale.
CalendarTestRunner: Demonstrates how top operate with a Calendar instance.
DateParsingAndFormattingTestRunner: Demonstrates some basic usage of DateFormat and SimpleDateFormat.
